title: Lesson 25
paragraph: Values and qualities define character and conduct. Honesty, emulation, delicacy, and insistence reflect individual traits and influence interactions positively.

words.example: He is honest about his mistakes.
The painting is worth a lot of money.
She handled the delicate china carefully.
It is hard to distinguish between the twins.
Only a fraction of the students passed the test.
Natural phenomena like rainbows fascinate scientists.
The children's laughter was a delight.

words.meaning: the act of demanding something firmly
words.example: Her insistence on fairness impressed everyone.

words.meaning: capable of being imitated or copied
words.example: His achievements are emulateable for aspiring artists.
